#summary rfem control file data format.
#sidebar TOC

==rfem.dat==

A typical rfem.dat file has the following format:

{{{
rfield
nels nxe nye
aa bb cc 
}}}

||*Variable Name*||*Type*||*Meaning*||
||{{{rfield}}} || Character || The name of the random field to be generated. The only permitted value is {{{sim3de}}}, which creates a regular 3D random field of Young's modulus values.||
||{{{nels}}} || Integer || Number of elements in the mesh.||
||{{{nxe}}} || Integer || Number of elements in x-direction.||
||{{{nze}}} || Integer || Number of element in z-direction.||
||{{{aa}}} || Real || Element dimension in x-direction.||
||{{{bb}}} || Real || Element dimension in y-direction.||
||{{{cc}}} || Real || Element dimension in z-direction.||

A real example follows:

{{{
sim3de
250 5 5
1.0 1.0 1.0
}}}
